tool.name: mergeTemplate
tool.displayname: Merge a selected metadata record with a saved template

param.name: Target_Metadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to a standalone XML metadata document or a dataset with an existing metadata document that you wish to edit.

param.name: Template_Metadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to a template metadata record. Elements from the template will overwrite their equivalents in the selected record based on the xpath rules provided in GenericTemplateXpathSettings.xml. The provided template (GenericMetadataTemplate_EMEPro.xml) can be used as a custom Set-To-Default tool. Both files are deployed with the python tool. Caution is urged when using this tool.

param.name: Overwrite
param.dialogReference: If this box is checked, the tool will overwrite existing elements with their equivalents found in the template. If it is left unchecked, the tool will only insert elements into the target document that have no existing equivalents.

tool.summary: This tool replaces the elements in a metadata record with elements from a saved template record. Elements from the template will overwrite their equivalents in the selected record based on the xpath rules provided in GenericTemplateXpathSettings.xml. The provided template (GenericMetadataTemplate_EMEPro.xml) can be used as a custom Set-To-Default tool. Both files are deployed with the python tool. Caution is urged when using this tool.
tool.usage: This tool may be used to quickly populate many common elements in an otherwise empty metadata document .

idCitation.resTitle: Merge a selected metadata record with a saved template

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool merges a selected metadata record with elements from a saved template record created using the "Save record as metadata template" tool. Elements from the template record will overwrite their equivalents in the selected record, but by design it will exclude those elements which must be unique in every metadata record, such as title, abstract, unique identifier, etc, replacing only those elements that are common across many records.
